BTXEX International digital cryptographic asset trading platform is a comprehensive digital asset trading platform, we have the leading technical strength, quality customer service and good user experience, for the majority of digital currency lovers to provide a free online exchange platform. \n\n BTXEX international digital cryptographic asset trading platform also provides digital currency white paper planning, cryptographic algorithm adjustment, digital currency research and development, trading platform on the one-stop block chain services. \n\n BTXEX international Digital encryption asset trading platform overseas operations center is set up in Singapore, Cambodia, Marshall. Domestic Beijing, Zhengzhou, Shenzhen three offices; China headquarters is set up in Hainan Lingshui Qingshui Bay International Information Industry Park. \n Digital assets are now in full swing, both good and bad. BTXEX will screen high-quality digital assets, attach importance to the transparency and governance structure of the project, and explore the value of high-quality digital assets together by referring to the decisions of market investors on the basis of the screening criteria formed by its own rating system. \n Our philosophy is to work with each and every member who is free to gather here to create a quality ecological soil of value flow and co-cultivation. \n BTXEX aims to build a relatively decentralised trading platform. The operation environment of the platform is safe, fair and benign. It is innovative and iterable, which is in line with the trend of social progress and development.
